Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm trying to build a drill to go on the Mun, as part of an outpost, but I'm stuck on the Convert-O-Tron part of the drill. If I dock a separate module to my outpost (with the drill), will the convert-o-tron send fuel to that module, or does the convert-o-tron have to be directly linked to a fuel tank to transfer fuel?

Hope someone can answer this!

It should work.  It might not work if the fuel has to pass through a reaction wheel, But I don't think there are any other parts that block the flow of fuel.  Just make sure to enable crossfeed on the docking ports.

3 minutes ago, RoninFrog said:

It should work.  It might not work if the fuel has to pass through a reaction wheel, But I don't think there are any other parts that block the flow of fuel.  Just make sure to enable crossfeed on the docking ports.

Thanks, I'll give it a shot!
The Convert-O-Trons will deposit newly created fuel to any fuel tank on the craft. They are also ignoring the crossfeed rules, so they will fuel a tank on the other side of a heat-shield or Klaw.

4 hours ago, AHHans said:

The Convert-O-Trons will deposit newly created fuel to any fuel tank on the craft. They are also ignoring the crossfeed rules, so they will fuel a tank on the other side of a heat-shield or Klaw.

It worked exactly like that, I docked it to the outpost and everything was shared and getting filled, thanks for the reply!

16 hours ago, TTV.Fully_Mysterio said:

Thanks, I'll give it a shot!

Thanks for the reply, as soon as I docked, all fuel tanks were shared and everything was filling as 1 tank!
